attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our Motorways are needlessy clogged up by people sitting in the middle and outside lanes because they either are too lazy to change lanes or "feel safer" staying in the same lane. With cars legally undertaking them they would not feel so comfortable and would move over - hence reducing the need to undertake!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
